abstract: President Obama warns about the growing economic dangers if Congress fails to raise the debt ceiling. | William A. Ackman has modified his bet against Herbalife. | UBS brokers in Puerto Rico have created a headache for the bank. | Cerberus Capital Management is looking to examine BlackBerry’s books.
